DataElement.preferredName: Past 4 Week Erection Usual Frequency  Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric code response to a question about the usual frequency of a person's erections during the previous four weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm. (NCI)_The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection whenever they wanted one.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual has or had an erection whenever they wanted one.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
